author: stefan2
msg: On the authzperf branch:  Finally unleash the full lookup speed benefits
by remembering the filtered path rule prefix trees between authz lookups.
This works because the svn_authz_t struct is conceptually immutable.
Hence, all entirely derived data remains valid for the whole lifetime
of the svn_authz_t struct.  So, let's add a small, simple LRU cache.
(svn_authz_t): Add an LRU cache for filtered path rule trees as
well as a pool to allocate dependent data from.
(get_filtered_tree): Implement cache lookup, population and eviction.
